About ME

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do.

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

I am Mateusz Madej, I'm 24 years old and I live in Cracow. I graduated from Jagiellonian University in English philology with German and Portuguese philology with Italian. I have been a private teacher (mostly in English) for four years now. Languages are my passion but so is Programming. I have been learning to program since the beginning of 2019. After a few months it became my real passion and I consider it a perfect combination - analytical thinking with the ability to use another language (in this case a computer language). I'm really keen on learning new things and thanks to programming I can do it constantly. I will be more than happy to create any Web Development project for you.
